message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to exceed your expectations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, it's valued at $150 by myself. Considering your appreciation for high-quality items, I believe this product would be a perfect fit for you. I kindly propose to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $120. This is an opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a discounted rate. Would you like to proceed with the purchase?
